content: These new pictures from HST are simply awesome. I think that program has been very successful and was well worth it. I support any future funding for space. Simply amazing. "http://abcnews.go.com/Technology/popup?id=1884338&contentIndex=1&page=20&start=false"

title: Hubble Captures Stunning Views of Mammoth Stars

content: HST is a national scientific asset of immense value and its service life will be extended by a minimum of five more years when the next servicing mission is launched (scheduled date is May 12th). The mission will replace two instruments, repair two others and install a bunch of other upgrades. The new instruments are an order of magnitude superior to the ones they are replacing. So if all goes well, "you ain't seen nothing yet"! Proud member of the NASA HST Development Project at Goddard Space Flight Center.
